name: Amazing Sarcophagus/Tomb
description:
The ancient sarcophagus found in 2003 in the Perge necropolis. MS. The sarcophagus belonging to the 3rd century is exhibited in the Hall of the Dead Cult of the Antalya Museum and is one of the most magnificent works of the hall. The sarcophagus shows a superior feature with the quality of the marble it is made of, its workmanship and the mythological scenes engraved on it.

On the first obverse, a story from the Iliad is told. On the other reverse side, the satyr and mainad ecstasis scene in the Dionysos regiment is depicted. The short side features a vintage scene of satyrs and mainads.
